trans-unit.source: Provides methods for <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> derived classes to access the functionality of the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos para as classes derivadas <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> para acessar a funcionalidade de tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Aborts the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Anula o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: Once <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> is called, most <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> APIs except <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> é chamado, a maioria <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> APIs exceto <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> lançar um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: Aborts the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Anula o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: Once <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> is called, most <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> APIs except <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> é chamado, a maioria <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> APIs exceto <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> lançar um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: The reason for aborting the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: O motivo para anular a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: Aborts the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> using the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: Anula a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> usando a exceção especificada.

trans-unit.source: Once <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> is called, most <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> APIs except <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> é chamado, a maioria <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> APIs exceto <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> lançar um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: The time period after which to abort the attempt.
trans-unit.target: O período após o qual anular a tentativa.

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the track operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: O método a ser chamado quando a operação de rastreamento for concluída.

trans-unit.source: The information about the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: As informações sobre a operação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to begin sending pending tracking records to tracking participants asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho para iniciar o envio de registros de acompanhamento pendentes aos participantes de acompanhamento de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The status of the current track operation.
trans-unit.target: O status da operação de rastreamento atual.

trans-unit.source: The status of the asynchronous track operation.
trans-unit.target: O status da operação assíncrona de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to end the track operation.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho para encerrar a operação de controle.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> is equal to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> atual é igual ao objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> of the object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o objeto é igual ao <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> atual; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The time period after which to abort the attempt.
trans-unit.target: O período após o qual anular a tentativa.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to send pending tracking records to tracking participants.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho para enviar os registros de acompanhamento pendentes para acompanhar os participantes.

trans-unit.source: Returns the exception that causes the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> to abort.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a exceção que faz com que a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> seja anulada.

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> to abort, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> did not abort.
trans-unit.target: A exceção que fez com que a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> fosse anulada ou <see langword="null" /> se a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> não foi anulada.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of available bookmarks for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a coleção de indicadores disponíveis para a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of available bookmarks for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a coleção de indicadores disponíveis para a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of bookmarks for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de indicadores para a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: The bookmark scope to inspect.
trans-unit.target: O escopo de indicadores a ser inspecionado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of available bookmarks for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> created in the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScope" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a coleção de indicadores disponíveis para a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> criada no <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScope" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The collection of bookmarks created in the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScope" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de indicadores criada no <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScope" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the final <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState" /> final da <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the final <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState" /> final da <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration members that describes the state of an activity instance.
trans-unit.target: Um dos membros de enumeração que descreve o estado de uma instância de atividade.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, <c>terminationException</c> contains the exception that caused the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> to terminate, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> did not terminate.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método é retornado, <c>terminationException</c> contém a exceção que fez com que <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> fosse encerrado ou <see langword="null" /> se a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> não foi encerrada.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro é passado não inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the final <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />, including termination exception.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState" /> final da <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />, incluindo exceções de encerramento.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration members that describes the state of an activity instance.
trans-unit.target: Um dos membros de enumeração que descreve o estado de uma instância de atividade.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, <c>outputs</c> contains a dictionary of <see cref="F:System.Activities.ArgumentDirection.Out" /> arguments of the workflow, keyed by argument name.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método é retornado, <c>outputs</c> contém um dicionário de argumentos <see cref="F:System.Activities.ArgumentDirection.Out" /> do fluxo de trabalho, inseridos pelo nome do argumento.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro é passado não inicializado.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, <c>terminationException</c> contains the exception that caused the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> to terminate, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> did not terminate.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método é retornado, <c>terminationException</c> contém a exceção que fez com que <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> fosse encerrado ou <see langword="null" /> se a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> não foi encerrada.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro é passado não inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the final <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />, including workflow outputs and termination exception.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState" /> final da <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />, incluindo saídas de fluxo de trabalho e a exceção de encerramento.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration members that describes the state of an activity instance.
trans-unit.target: Um dos membros de enumeração que descreve o estado de uma instância de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para este <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" />.
trans-unit.target: O código hash deste <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a dictionary of variables in the current scope that have been specified with <see cref="F:System.Activities.VariableModifiers.Mapped" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um dicionário de variáveis no escopo atual que foram especificadas com <see cref="F:System.Activities.VariableModifiers.Mapped" />.

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of mapped variables currently in scope.
trans-unit.target: Um dicionário de variáveis mapeadas atualmente no escopo.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to determine whether this workflow instance has pending tracking records and a tracking participant.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho para determinar se esta instância de fluxo de trabalho tem registros de acompanhamento pendentes e um participante de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this workflow instance has pending tracking records and a tracking participant; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se esta instância de fluxo de trabalho pendentes registros de rastreamento e um participante de rastreamento; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> is in a state where it can be persisted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> está em um estado em que ela pode ser persistente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> can be persisted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> pode ser persistente; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether two <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se duas instâncias <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> instances are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as duas instâncias <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> forem iguais, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether two <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se duas instâncias <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> instances are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as duas instâncias <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> não são iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the workflow runtime pause the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> at the next point of execution where it is possible to persist.
trans-unit.target: Solicita que o tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho pause a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> no próximo ponto de execução em que é possível persistir.

trans-unit.source: Note that the scheduler queue may not be empty at this point.
trans-unit.target: Observe que a fila do agendador não pode estar vazia neste momento.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> state for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o estado <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> para serialização.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance state.
trans-unit.target: Um estado de instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the scheduler stops.
trans-unit.target: Solicita a interrupção do agendador.

trans-unit.source: Instructs the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> to begin execution.
trans-unit.target: Instrui a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> a iniciar a execução.

trans-unit.source: Schedules a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" /> resumption.
trans-unit.target: Agenda uma continuidade de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" />.

trans-unit.source: The bookmark to resume.
trans-unit.target: O indicador a ser retomado.

trans-unit.source: The data to be passed to the activity that created the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: Os dados a serem passados para a atividade que criou o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" />.

trans-unit.source: Schedules a bookmark resumption with the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Agenda uma continuidade de indicador com o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates the result of a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" /> scheduling operation.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração que indica o resultado de uma operação de agendamento <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" />.

trans-unit.source: The bookmark to resume.
trans-unit.target: O indicador a ser retomado.

trans-unit.source: The data to be passed to the activity that created the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: Os dados a serem passados para a atividade que criou o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" /> under which the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" /> was created.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" /> com base no qual o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" /> foi criado.

trans-unit.source: Schedules a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" /> resumption from the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScope" />.
trans-unit.target: Agenda uma continuidade de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" /> com base no <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScope" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates the result of a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" /> scheduling operation.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração que indica o resultado de uma operação de agendamento <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" />.

trans-unit.source: Schedules the cancellation of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Agenda o cancelamento da <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: This method schedules a cancel request for the root activity of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método agenda para a atividade de raiz de uma solicitação de cancelamento de <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado do <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the state of a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração que especifica o estado de um <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the reason for terminating the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: A exceção que é o motivo para encerrar a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: Transitions the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> into the terminal <see cref="F:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState.Faulted" /> state using the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: Faz a transição da <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> para o estado <see cref="F:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState.Faulted" /> terminal usando a exceção especificada.

trans-unit.source: The tracking record to add.
trans-unit.target: O registro de acompanhamento a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to add the specified pending record to the list of pending records.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho para adicionar o registro pendente especificado à lista de registros pendentes.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to determine whether tracking is enabled in this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho para determinar se o acompanhamento está habilitado nesta instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if tracking is enabled in this workflow instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o rastreamento estiver habilitado nessa instância de fluxo de trabalho; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
